Desc.entry: Local Methodist church. Highfield Trinity also shares its buildings with three partner churches, Shiloh Apostolic Church, Hope of Glory Church and Holy Church (an independent, interdenominational and multicultural bilingual - English and French - church).

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Service at 10.30am (Highfield Trinity); Sunday Services at 12.30pm & 7.30pm, Mon 10.30am-12.30pm, Wed 7.30-9.30pm (Shiloh Apostolic Church); Sunday Services 12.30-2.30pm (services in English and French and choir practice, Hope of Glory Church); Sunday Worship 3-5pm, Thurs 6-7pm (Bible School), Sat 5-8pm (Prayer Meeting and orchestra practice, Holy Church)
